name: com.gb.statemachine_toolkit
description: A First Person Toolkit that lets you create your State Machine using the Unity Animator, without writing a line of code!

samples.description: The Text State Type is used to update the text of a Text or TextMeshProUGUI component
Dialogue State Type is used to show a Dialogue with a sequence of texts to be read pressing a next button, or a Question with answers that can be selected.

The Cutscene State Type is used to animate objects, start timelines and play videos, or simply set parameters of an animator.
The Object State is used to activate / deactivate a GameObject
The Scene Change State is used to load a new scene, with or without using a custom loader
